About Yawg Project

Yawg is a static site generator.

Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

Name Description
Yawg acceptance tests Set of acceptance tests.
Yawg API Yawg API classes required for implementing extensions.
Yawg CLI Command line utility for baking a site from a directory tree.
Yawg core Core Yawg classes.
Yawg release builder Used for creating an Yawg release bundle.
Yawg SPI Yawg SPI classes for embedding Yawg in applications.
Yawg test utilities Utility classes used within unit tests in other modules.
